stripped_text: +2 mu Once per turn -> When you encounter a piece of ice, you may get -1 maximum hand size until your next turn begins. If you do, the strength of that ice is lowered to 0 for the remainder of the encounter. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +2[mu] Once per turn → When you encounter a piece of ice, you may get –1 maximum hand size until your next turn begins. If you do, the strength of that ice is lowered to 0 for the remainder of the encounter. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Şifr
